name: High-Calibre Vivid Simulacrum
description:
Knitweave Jam 4 Game Jam

The friendly neighbourhood AI Karl, tasks the mighty Gary Strong-Arm to take on his evil brother, Steve, who won't let people wake up from his simulation.

Made in 3 Days

Theme: Artillery + Colour + Simulation

Creators 

Jordan Reilly Art/Sound/Level Design

Huw Warren-Roberts Developer/Code
